Miami_Beach.Wells Fargo Center (Miami):
The Wells Fargo Center (previously known as Met 2 Financial Center) is part of the Metropolitan Miami complex in the central business district of Downtown Miami, Florida, United States. It was completed in 2010 and is the fifth tallest building in Miami, as well as in Florida.
The Wells Fargo Center is adjacent to the JW Marriott Marquis Miami, a 31-story, 367-foot (112 m) building which is occupied by a JW Marriott Hotel building.
